name: Ad Infinitum (Keltfire)
description:
You are the Timekeeper. The keeper of time. Through you, all of eternity is kept in balance. However, none other than Chaos himself threatens to throw all of it out of balance. It is up to you as Timekeeper to put a stop to him. Are you up to the task?

Credits:

Font is Thaleah Pixel Font: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059

Sound Effects from mixkit: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/

Battle Music is "Let the Games Begin" by Psychronic from Pixabay
